name: Skeleton
description: A skeleton bound to a wizard's will. They are treated as cannon fodder and not particularly durable.

0.name: Spear
0.description: Swing [5AP/2d6 Rending], Thrust [5AP/4d6+2 Piercing], Double Grip 4, Stun

1.name: Vulnerability
1.description: Skeletons have a vulnerability to Crushing damage, taking double damage from it.

2.name: Resistance
2.description: Skeletons resist Piercing damage, taking half damage from it.
